General.Name: Interhides Public Company Limited
General.Description: Interhides Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes leather coverings for car seats and other related products in Thailand, China, Switzerland, Malaysia, India, Indonesia, Vietnam, Taiwan, England, Japan, Cambodia, and internationally. It offers finished leather products, cut parts, trim covers, steering wheels, gear knobs, and other products. The company also provides spray and tanning services; and bleaching, dyeing finishing, and other services. In addition, it manufactures and distributes hydrolyzed protein from leather scrap; and collagen peptides. The company primarily serves the automotive industry, as well as furniture makers, dog chew makers, etc. Interhides Public Company Limited was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.
General.Address: 678 Soi T.J.C., Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand, 10280
